title: THE OPRHANAGE @ The Moxie
body:
If you've looked at our new January calendar, I'm sure you've noticed that the last two days are empty. Well, that's not the case anymore. We recently secured THE ORPHANAGE, a brand new Spanish horror film presented by Guillermo del Toro. Nicole used a great picture on our official page, but check out the one above... CREEPY! And I dug up a high quality version of the new trailer, which is 1,000,000 times better than the crappy one on Apple's website. Enjoy!



THE ORPHANAGE starts on January 30th.
author: Dan

comments.author: Girl #2
comments.body: that picture might give me nightmares tonight. (I can't wait for this!)
